    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Padajoča toga palica in žoga</string>
            <string language="en">Falling stiff stick and ball</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fallender steifer Stock und Kugel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bâton et boule raides en chute</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vara e esfera duras de queda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bastone e sfera rigidi cadenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μειωμένες δύσκαμπτες ραβδί και σφαίρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Palillo y bola derechos que caen</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Nagnjeno togo palico in žogo hkrati spustimo z iste višine in opazujemo dogajanje.</string>
            <string language="en">Rigid rod and ball are dropped on the floor at the same moment from the same height.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gravitacija</string>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">težišče</string>
            <string language="en">center of mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">prosti pad</string>
            <string language="en">free-fall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">templates</string>
            <string language="en">templates</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Steife Stange und Kugel werden auf den Fußboden 
am gleichen Moment von der gleichen Höhe fallengelassen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La tige et la boule rigides sont lâchées sur le
plancher au même moment de la même taille.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A haste e a esfera rígidas são deixadas cair no
assoalho no mesmo momento da mesma altura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'asta e la sfera rigidi sono caduti sul 
pavimento allo stesso momento dalla stessa altezza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Την άκαμπτες ράβδο και η σφαίρα πέφτουν στο πάτωμα 
στην ίδια στιγμή από το ίδιο ύψος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La barra y la bola rígidas se caen en el suelo 
en el mismo momento de la misma altura.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mitte der Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">freier Fall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">centro da massa</string>
